executive_summary.overall_assessment: The Arabic Inventory Management System shows promise but requires significant improvements in security, code quality, and user experience.
key_strengths: Comprehensive feature set for inventory management

Add loading states and error handling UX
Optimize for mobile-first design

Ensure data residency compliance for target markets

Target enterprise customers for higher revenue per user
Develop partnerships with Arabic business software vendors
Review and reduce dependency count to lower maintenance costs
